param.name: pszItemID
param.para: A pointer to a buffer containing the item ID representing the desired item. The ID is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.

param.name: ppItem
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an instance representing the sync item.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. Returns E_INVALIDARG if the handler does not recognize the ID specified at ppszItemID.

summary.para: Gets an interface that enumerates the handler's sync items.

param.name: ppenum
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an instance. IEnumSyncMgrSyncItems can be used to retrieve an interface for each sync item in the set.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method replaces the older method. The older method returned an enumerator interface which returned a structure for each sync item. To get the data previously provided by that structure, Sync Center calls on each item's interface to request a corresponding interface.
The number of enumerated items can be obtained through the method.
